svg.text: MISSION: Scalable AI for Mission-Critical Systems
Building the infrastructure for AI that cannot fail

g.text: The Linus Philosophy Applied to AI
"How fast can a Xeon really go if we"
"What if the forward pass was 10x leaner,"
Method: Hypothesis → Experiment → Measure → Prove → Share on YouTube
YouTube: Building in Public = Building Community
Same input → Same output → Same time
Enabling AI where it was never safe before
Not building products. Building the infrastructure that products run on.
Build production AI infrastructure that runs on commodity hardware,
from datacenter Xeons to embedded Cortex-M processors,
enabling AI deployment where it was never possible before.
In 10 years, when AI runs everywhere from Xeon clusters to MCUs,
it will run on your infrastructure. Built in C. Optimized with love.
